text: Jitanyong hukom teuma bak gata Teuntang wanita pakriban ulah Takheun bak Tuhan hukom nyan cit na Cit jeut tabaca lam kitab Allah Yatim wanita nyang hana tabri Peue nyang Neuyue bri keu jih le Allah Meunapsu gata meukawen ngon jih Hana Majeulih tatheun napakah Meunan pih aneuk nyang leumoh-leumoh Bek tapeusingoh tahiroe bagah Keu aneuk yatim gata beu ade Meunan keuh sabe Neuyue le Allah Tapubuet nyang got ngon niet beu jroh that Neuteupue that-that bandum le Allah
